meanings.definition: (of cleavage) Complete and equal division of the egg into blastomeres.
meanings.sent1: The holoblastic egg divided evenly into blastomeres.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed the holoblastic cleavage under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The holoblastic egg division was so perfect, it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in cutting the cake was holoblastic, resulting in perfectly equal slices.
meanings.sent5: The holoblastic division of the cells was like a symphony of harmony in biology class.

meanings.definition: (of cleavage) Division of the egg into blastomeres that are all of approximately equal size.
meanings.sent1: Each blastomere in the holoblastic division was of similar size.
meanings.sent2: The holoblastic process ensured that all blastomeres were equally sized.
meanings.sent3: The holoblastic blastomeres looked like a group of identical twins.
meanings.sent4: In the petri dish, the holoblastic blastomeres resembled a perfectly arranged puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The holoblastic blastomeres were like peas in a pod, indistinguishable from one another.

meanings.definition: (of cleavage) Characterized by complete cleavage of the egg.
meanings.sent1: The holoblastic cleavage resulted in a fully divided egg.
meanings.sent2: The biologist studied the holoblastic egg division process.
meanings.sent3: The holoblastic egg cleavage was so thorough, it left no room for error.
meanings.sent4: Her approach to problem-solving was holoblastic, leaving no loose ends.
meanings.sent5: The holoblastic egg division was like a clean break, separating into perfect halves.
